thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Jim Husband

author: Jim Husband
title: Jim Husband
text:
I found Flashbay on-line when I was looking for a particular flash drive.
From the very first contact, they were knowledgeable, patient, and courteous.
Catherine, our rep, was very helpful, and dealing with her was great.
She was thorough, about determining our needs, cheerful, and pleasant. We were offered a wide variety of flash drives, many of which were new to us. Catherine showed us some variations for our approval, and came up with one that exceeded our expectations. The final product is very impressive.
We look forward to dealing with Catherine, and Flashbay again, and would recommend them to anyone looking for something new and eye catching to promote their business.
